Function of collecting articles on many press of Burkina Faso

bf_news_collect.Rd

Collection function of all the articles of contry Burkina Faso

bf_news_collect(start_d, end_d, press = "all")

Arguments

start_d

yyyy-mm-dd start date of collection (oldest date, eg: yesterday)
end_d

yyyy-mm-dd end date of collection (newest date, eg: today)
press

specify the name of a press.

Value

a table containing the articles published in the period

Examples

library(afnews)
dt_ <- bf_news_collect(start_d="2020-10-20", end_d="2020-10-28", press="all")

#> Done!
#> >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 
#> Done!
head(dt_)

#>   date_article
#> 1   2020-10-22
#> 2   2020-10-21
#> 3   2020-10-20
#> 4   2020-10-28
#> 5   2020-10-28
#> 6   2020-10-27
